desc: 通常攻撃時、ＢＢゲージを超絶増加＆ＢＢ発動に必要なＢＢゲージ量を少し軽減＆通常攻撃ＨＩＴ数を増加＆ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ

dictionary.lore: Legend states that when a baby saddled with a peculiar fate was born, a shining dragon appeared before mother and child, wishing them fortune and giving them a charm made from part of its own body. The charm never left the baby's side, and they grew to be a courageous hero who could defeat any hardship that presented itself.

name: 輝龍のアミュレット

materials.name: 輝水晶のアンクレット
技宝ソルジェネレーター
